| A umbral hulk:* can [tunnel](/wiki/Tunnel "Tunnel") through walls.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* wanders randomly.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                     |

An **umbral hulk**, U, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is a counterpart to the [umber hulk](/wiki/Umber_hulk "Umber hulk") that shares the same bite and claw attacks, and its gaze can [blind](/wiki/Blind "Blind") targets instead of confusing them.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)

## Generation

Umbral hulks may generate as peaceful towards [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") characters.

In SlashTHEM and Hack'EM, umbral hulks can generate in the [terror hall](/index.php?title=Terror_hall\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Terror hall (page does not exist)") [special room](/index.php?title=Special_room_\(SlashTHEM\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Special room (SlashTHEM) (page does not exist)").

## Strategy

Umbral hulks are somewhat easier to deal with if you blind yourself manually, e.g. with a [blindfold](/wiki/Blindfold "Blindfold") - fortunately, blinding from their own gaze also prevents it from affecting you further.

## History

The umbral hulk originates in the [biodiversity patch](/wiki/Biodiversity_patch "Biodiversity patch").

## Encyclopedia entry

Umber hulks are powerful subterranean predators whose  
iron-like claws allow them to burrow through solid stone in  
search of prey. They are tremendously strong; muscles bulge  
beneath their thick, scaly hides and their powerful arms and  
legs all end in great claws.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Umbral_hulk\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Umbral hulk

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
U umbral hulk (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 2d5, Gaze blind 3d4
U umbral hulk (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 2d5, Gaze blind 3d4

Base level 10
Base experience 246
Speed 6
Base AC 2
Base MR 25
Alignment -3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 500
Size Large
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A umbral hulk:

  • can tunnel through walls.
  • is carnivorous.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.

An umbral hulk, U, is a type of monster that appears in SpliceHack, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is a counterpart to the umber hulk that shares the same bite and claw attacks, and its gaze can blind targets instead of confusing them.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 History
  • 4 Encyclopedia entry

Generation

Umbral hulks may generate as peaceful towards neutral characters.

In SlashTHEM and Hack'EM, umbral hulks can generate in the terror hall special room.

Strategy

Umbral hulks are somewhat easier to deal with if you blind yourself manually, e.g. with a blindfold - fortunately, blinding from their own gaze also prevents it from affecting you further.

History

The umbral hulk originates in the biodiversity patch.

Encyclopedia entry

Umber hulks are powerful subterranean predators whose
iron-like claws allow them to burrow through solid stone in
search of prey. They are tremendously strong; muscles bulge
beneath their thick, scaly hides and their powerful arms and
legs all end in great claws.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

An '''umbral hulk''', {{black|U}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SpliceHack]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is a counterpart to the [[umber hulk]] that shares the same bite and claw attacks, and its gaze can [[blind]] targets instead of confusing them.

==Generation==
Umbral hulks may generate as peaceful towards [[neutral]] characters.

In SlashTHEM and Hack'EM, umbral hulks can generate in the [[terror hall]] [[Special room (SlashTHEM)|special room]].

==Strategy==
Umbral hulks are somewhat easier to deal with if you blind yourself manually, e.g. with a [[blindfold]] - fortunately, blinding from their own gaze also prevents it from affecting you further.

==History==
The umbral hulk originates in the [[biodiversity patch]].

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|
Umber hulks are powerful subterranean predators whose
iron-like claws allow them to burrow through solid stone in
search of prey.  They are tremendously strong; muscles bulge
beneath their thick, scaly hides and their powerful arms and
legs all end in great claws.
}}
